definition: to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

sentences.english: In the second chapter, the forward scattering series methods have been deducted.
sentences.chinese: 第二章推导了逆散射级数法的正演过程。

sentences.english: The transfer function of piezoelectric transducers has been deduced in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 推导出压电式传感器的传递函数。

sentences.english: According to this assumption, a formula to calculate the amount of shells in one hail suppression operation at a site has been deduced.
sentences.chinese: 推导出每个炮点一次防雹作业用弹量的计算公式。

sentences.english: Jeff's hardheaded analysis does not stop at why and how to do all this.
sentences.chinese: 萨克斯无懈可击的分析，并不止步于推导和建议。

sentences.english: The relationship between the rock impedance and the measured impedance is derived. The validity and feasibilty of the correction method isp…
sentences.chinese: 从理论上推导出了岩心复阻抗与测量阻抗之间的关系。

sentences.english: Mathematical model of space robots based on twist denotations is deduced.
sentences.chinese: 推导了旋量表示的空间机器人数学模型。

sentences.english: And finally, the relation between cutset voltage and independent node voltage is derived.
sentences.chinese: 推导出割集电压与独立节点电压之间的关系。

sentences.english: In the paper, the frequency response of strainmeter is derived.
sentences.chinese: 本文推导了应变仪的频率特性。

sentences.english: Applying the method of mathematical regression analysis, one regression equation was found.
sentences.chinese: 用一元回归分析的方法推导出了一个回归方程。

sentences.english: There are some means to solve D'Alembert Solution, one of them is eigenvalue means.
sentences.chinese: 该公式的推导方法中一个最基本方法是特征线法。

sentences.english: A restoration algorithm based on the mathematical models of point-spread function was proposed and a Wiener filter algorithm avoiding the.
sentences.chinese: 并通过建立相应的数学模型推导了系统的点扩展函数。

sentences.english: Derivation of a formula for determination of proportion of paternal trisomy 21 is presented.
sentences.chinese: 推导公式确定比例的父亲是21三体。

sentences.english: A universal model for calculation of gland seal system has been deduced using matrix method.
sentences.chinese: 应用矩阵推导出了轴封系统的通用计算模型。

sentences.english: So, let's try to figure it out from these formulas.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我们试着从这些式子推导。

sentences.english: Consequently, people may get the relation between seismic interval velocity and displacement pressure.
sentences.chinese: 由此可以推导出地震层速度与排替压力的关系式。

sentences.english: Stem derivation is not applied to out-of-vocabulary words.
sentences.chinese: 词干推导不会应用到词汇表之外的词汇。

definition: to fit (data to a model)/a (close) fit
to sum up/to summarize/to conclude from facts/induction (method of deduction in logic)
to deduce/to infer/an implication/same as 推演
rules of calculation (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division)/algorithm/fig. to scheme/to calculate (i.e. plot)
